      • game

        public void game(Players p,
                 int dice,
                 Game game)
        This method is checking the players position and directing him/her to the right function or doing some operations according to place and money
        Parameters:
        p - This method takes an player which is playing at that turn
        dice - This method takes an dice number as integer
        game - This is the game object which we have been playing
        Since:
        2016.04.12

      • action

        public java.lang.String action(Players p,
                               Players po,
                               int dice,
                               Game game)
        This method is checking the players position after the jail part and directing him/her to the right function or doing some operations according to place and money
        Parameters:
        p - This method takes an player which is playing at that turn
        po - This method takes an player which is not playing at that turn(enemy player)
        dice - This method takes an dice number as integer
        game - This is the game object which we have been playing
        Returns:
        It returns an output string for write it in game function
        Since:
        2016.04.12

      • play

        public void play(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> commandArray,
                 Game game)
        This method is checking the players name and taking the right dice number for this player and directing the player to game function for operations
        Parameters:
        commandArray - This method takes an array list that includes the command lines for this game
        game - This is the game object which we have been playing
        Since:
        2016.04.12
